name: phonebook-backend
description: Full stack open 2022 - Phonebook exercises part 3

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Kenny Vu
